testCases.title: Verify user can navigate to Billing
testCases.expectedResult: Billing page should be displayed with header and action buttons

testCases.title: Verify clear/cross button functionality
testCases.expectedResult: User should be navigated back to Dashboard

testCases.title: Verify Daily Billing button navigation
steps: Verify navigation to Daily Billing view
testCases.expectedResult: User should be navigated to Daily Billing view/page

testCases.title: Verify clinic dropdown is visible and accessible
testCases.expectedResult: Clinic dropdown should be visible and accessible on the daily billing page

testCases.title: Verify switching clinic updates billing records
steps: Select a different clinic from dropdown
Refresh page to load new records
Verify billing records are updated for selected clinic
testCases.expectedResult: After selecting clinic and refreshing page, billing grid should display selected clinic's records

testCases.title: Verify selected clinic remains active after page refresh
steps: Verify previously selected clinic remains selected
testCases.expectedResult: Previously selected clinic should remain selected after page refresh

testCases.title: Verify system does not display previous clinic data after switching
steps: Note billing records for Clinic A
Refresh page to load Clinic A data
Switch to Clinic B from dropdown
Refresh page to load Clinic B data
Verify no data from Clinic A is visible in billing grid
testCases.expectedResult: No data from Clinic A should be visible after switching to Clinic B

testCases.title: Verify selected clinic is visually indicated
steps: Verify selected clinic is displayed in dropdown field
testCases.expectedResult: Selected clinic should be clearly highlighted in the dropdown and visible in the dropdown field
